mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.project_name AS "projectName", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.status AS "status"
mapper.insert: insert into mt_project( project_name, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, status ) values ( #{projectName}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{status} )

insert into mt_project
project_name,
create_by,
create_date,
update_by,
update_date,
remarks,
status
#{projectName},
#{createBy},
#{createDate},
#{updateBy},
#{updateDate},
#{remarks},
#{status}
mapper.update: update mt_project set project_name = #{projectName}, create_by = #{createBy}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}

update mt_project
project_name = #{projectName},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_date = #{createDate},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_date = #{updateDate},
remarks = #{remarks},
status = #{status}
where id = #{id}
